description:
The all singing-all dancing, new Greggs App has landed, and in our humble opinion, your phone isn’t smart without it!

Whether you want to earn rewards for your shopping, grab and go with our Click + Collect service or just browse our menu – we’ve got you covered.

We’ve also added some handy extras like a new and improved Shop Finder to make getting your Greggs fix even easier, no matter where you are. And there’s a brand-new Greggs Wallet which stores all your ways to pay in one handy place, including the option to ‘auto top-up’ so you always have money to spend in Greggs.

How does it work?
 
Easy, just download the app for FREE to get in on the action. In your app you’ll get 6 different stamp cards, one for each product category - from sandwiches to sweet treats. Each time you buy a product in a shop or through Click + Collect, you get a stamp. Collect 9 stamps in a category, and the 10th item you choose in that category will be on us.

If that wasn’t enough to make you smile, as a thank you, we’ll send you tasty treats and little surprises, like a FREE sweet treat on your birthday. Because you know, we’re nice like that :)

app_name: Too Good To Go: End Food Waste
description:
Too Good To Go is your smart way to enjoy tasty food at great value, while doing good for the planet. Winner of the 2023 ‘Cultural Impact’ category at the prestigious Apple App Store Awards, the #1 app to reduce food waste helps you save delicious, unsold snacks, meals, and ingredients from local shops, cafés, supermarkets, restaurants, and top brands—all at great prices. 

In a world where 40% of food produced goes to waste each year, reducing food waste is the #1 action we can take to help tackle climate change. With Too Good To Go, you can unlock affordable meals and grocery items while helping to save the planet. Together, we have the power to make a real difference.



HOW TOO GOOD TO GO WORKS:

EXPLORE AND DISCOVER
Download the app to explore a map showing nearby restaurants, cafés, bakeries, supermarkets or trusted brands offering good food at a great price, ready to be rescued.

SAVE YOUR SURPRISE BAG OR TOO GOOD TO GO PARCEL
Browse a variety of Surprise Bags filled with tasty, unsold food—whether it’s sushi, pizza, burgers, or fresh fruits and veggies. Prefer to get your favourite food brands delivered to you? Save a Too Good To Go Parcel packed with good food from the brands you love, at great prices. 

AFFORDABLE EATS
Save a Surprise Bag or a Too Good To Go Parcel at ½ price or less. 

RESERVE YOUR SAVE
Confirm your purchase through the app to reserve your Surprise Bag and rescue these delicious meals from going to waste. By rescuing food, you save money and help fight food waste.

ENJOY
Collect your Surprise Bag at the scheduled time, or have your Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.


WHY TOO GOOD TO GO?:

WALLET-FRIENDLY INDULGENCE
Enjoy quality meals at affordable prices, satisfying both your taste buds and your wallet.

VARIETY AND CHOICE
Too Good To Go partners with a wide selection of local favourites and top brands, offering everything from sushi, pizza, baked and fresh goods to easy-to-store staple grocery items such as snacks, drinks, sweets or pasta.

ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT
Each meal saved avoids CO2e emissions and the unnecessary use of water and land resources. By rescuing food from going to waste, you take a step towards a greener, cleaner planet. 

EASY PURCHASE PROCESS
The app’s simple and user-friendly interface makes it easy to browse, choose, and save Surprise Bags or Too Good To Go Parcels.

CONVENIENCE
Pick up your Surprise Bag at the designated time, or have a Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.

JOIN THE TOO GOOD TO GO COMMUNITY
Join the community of food lovers making a positive impact on the environment. Download the app now and start reducing food waste, bite by bite. 
Reducing food waste is a key action to help tackle climate change. For more information, visit tgtg.to/claims

Love coffee? Then you’re in the right place. The Costa Coffee app makes being a coffee fan so much easier and more rewarding. It’s the simplest way to collect Costa Club beans, order your favourite drink for collection in store, find your nearest Costa, view your beans balance and exchange beans for free treats. Yum!

All of your Costa Club details are in the palm of your hand, so there’s no need to carry your loyalty card. Just scan your phone at the till whenever you make a purchase, or scan the code from Costa Express machines whilst your drink is being made. You can even order your favourite drink from a Costa Express machine, all from the app!

With our app, you can:

• Log in with your current Costa Club account details, register an existing card or set up a new account (and get a new member bonus of 1 bean!)
• Use mobile ordering to order ahead and skip the queue in store
• You can now use your free drink rewards on Collect orders
• One touch contactless reordering from a Costa Express machine
• Treat a friend by gifting them a reward
• Track your beans balance to see when you have enough for a free handcrafted drink
• Find details of your nearest Costa stores including directions, opening times and facilities
• Ditch the card and keep Costa Club in your pocket at all times
• Add your Costa Club card to your Apple Wallet

We pass your Costa Club ID internally within our systems to deliver more relevant and personalised content and rewards in the future.You can contact Customer Services to opt out of the profiling of your personal data.

Already using the app? We’d love to hear your ideas for how we might make it better. Let us know at https://www.costa.co.uk/contact

Unfortunately, the Costa Coffee app is not currently available for use in Northern Ireland.

Download and place your first McDonald's order in restaurant, drive thru or delivery using the My McDonald's App. Ordering has never been easier with our new McDelivery feature. Or, if you prefer, why not have your order brought to you with Click & Serve? Available any time of day, with many restaurants open 24/7!
 
Exclusive App Offers
Fancy a cheeky mid-week treat? Check out our range of food offers available exclusively on the McDonald’s app.

McDelivery®
Need a night off cooking? You can now order McDonald’s delivery through the McDonald’s app!

Order Ahead
Want to make your breakfast AND your 9am train? Order ahead with the McDonald’s app to make picking up even easier.

Click & Serve
Want to park up and get your order brought over to your car? Park in a Click & Serve numbered bay, enter your bay number into the app and we’ll do the rest.

Table Service
How about a little bit of ‘me time’ with Table Service? Place your order through the McDonald’s app, relax and let us come to you.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

On the Just Eat app, you can order food – from pizza and sushi to burgers and kebabs – along with groceries, gifts, flowers and more, all delivered right to your door. With a wide selection of restaurants, supermarkets and local shops, you can enjoy whatever you want, wherever you are.

Top brand and local heroes
Order from big brands like McDonald's, Burger King, KFC, Pizza Hut, Domino’s, Wagamama, Starbucks, Greggs, Costa Coffee and even more local favourites. Explore menus with a variety of choices, including vegan and vegetarian options, to suit every craving.

Need groceries? Get them delivered.
Shop for essentials from top supermarkets like Sainsbury’s, Co-op, and Asda, or other local convenience stores. Whether you need fresh fruit, vegetables, snacks, flowers, alcohol, beauty products or household essentials, Just Eat has it all.


What can you do on the Just Eat app?
- Order food for delivery from restaurants, cafes, bakeries and more.
- Get groceries delivered to your door, including fresh produce, frozen food, drinks and everyday essentials.
- Order any time, whether it’s for breakfast, lunch, dinner or a late-night snack.
- Find lighter meal options, including poke bowls, salads, wraps, and sandwiches.
- Choose from many international cuisines, including Indian, Chinese, Thai, Greek, Mexican, and Korean.
- Discover exclusive restaurant deals and discounts in the ‘Offers’ section.

Track or collect your order
Track your order in real-time with the Food Tracker® feature. You’ll receive push notifications about the status of your order. It usually takes 30-45 minutes to deliver your food or groceries. Prefer collection? Simply choose the ‘collection’ option in the Just Eat app and pick up your order at your convenience.


Why Just Eat?
- Quick and hassle-free food delivery.
- Great offers and discounts.
- Choose to collect your order at the restaurant or store.
- Browse grocery stores, cuisines, offers, top-rated restaurants, nearby spots, and vegetarian/vegan/halal options.
- Get regular updates on your order with a handy Food Tracker®.
- Choose from multiple payment options.

With over 98,000+ restaurants, supermarkets and stores at your fingertips, Just Eat makes food and grocery delivery easier than ever.

Download the Just Eat app now and get what you love, delivered.

Hungry? Get your favourite meals, takeaways and groceries delivered to your door in minutes with Deliveroo. From local gems to big-name brands, discover thousands of restaurants and supermarkets near you.

ALL YOUR FAVOURITES, DELIVERED:

- Restaurants: Big brands and local gems
- Grocery: Always fresh with our Freshness Promise
- Convenience: Beauty essentials, flowers, gifts, DIY and more in minutes

Order from the restaurants you’re craving...

- Sushi or pizza?
- A Chinese or Indian?
- Burgers, pasta, breakfast or something sweet?

All of your favourites are just a tap away from top brands like KFC, McDonald’s, Burger King, Subway, Nando’s, Wagamama, Popeyes, Papa John’s, Wingstop, Giggling Squid, Kokoro, Pizza Express, Five Guys, Franco Manca, Dishoom, Pho, Taco Bell, Starbucks, Gail's Bakery, Joe & the Juice, GBK and more!

Or Fancy something different? Discover thousands of local gems that deliver right to your door.

£0 DELIVERY FEE WITH DELIVEROO PLUS

Become a member and you’ll also unlock:

- Exclusive offers and member-only deals
- Monthly rewards that help your money go further
- Discounted service fees*
- Earn 10% back on restaurant orders over £30*

*Plus Gold members only

It’s the simplest way to save while enjoying what you love most.

SUPERMARKETS SORTED

Get groceries delivered fast from top supermarkets, including Waitrose, ASDA, Morrisons, M&S, Sainsbury’s, Co-Op, Amazon Fresh, Whole Foods, Spar, One Stop, Iceland and Majestic Wine.

MORE THAN FOOD

We’re here for the everyday essentials and little treats too. From Boots and Healf to Not On The High Street, B&Q, Screwfix, Accessorize and The Perfume Shop, we've got you covered.

WHY CHOOSE DELIVEROO?

- Track every order live from kitchen to doorstep
- Enjoy fast, reliable delivery when it matters
- Order for right now or schedule for later
- Pick up deals you won’t find anywhere else

Download the app today and let us bring the best of your neighbourhood straight to your door.

T&Cs apply. Visit the website for full details.

The Starbucks® UK app is a convenient way to pay in store or order ahead and skip the queue. You collect Stars for free drinks, food and merchandise. 

You can unlock faster rewards with more choices by taking advantage of our tiered rewards program. Keep track of your Stars and check your membership level anytime. 

Say hello to easy ordering, endless choices and - yes, free coffee... And now your Stars can unlock even more rewards. "
Here’s how it works:
- You will now get 10 Stars for every £1 spent
- Get a free drink from a little at 130 Stars, or save those Stars for food, a wider range of drinks or even selected merchandise.
- At 2500 Stars, you've reached Gold Level. Gold members get 1 extra syrup or topping, an extra shot, dairy alternative and whipped cream on the house. And enjoy a Birthday drink on us too!
Get started in 3 simple steps:
1. Create an account
2. Collect Stars
3. Get rewards

Every great meal starts with OpenTable. Download the app to find the perfect restaurant no matter where life takes you.  

DISCOVER SOMETHING NEW
- Choose from over 60,000+ restaurants worldwide 
- Search for happy hours, tasting menus, and other special dining experiences
- Get insights from real diners who have visited the restaurant with verified reviews
- Filter by cuisine, pricepoint, and more to fine-tune your options
- Take advantage of expert recommendations with OpenTable’s guides 

FIND A TIME THAT WORKS FOR YOU
- Search for specific dates, times, and specific locations to see what’s available when you want to go out 
- View full availability to see when you can get into your favorite spots 
- Use Notify Me to receive alerts for last-minute openings at popular restaurants

MANAGE YOUR PLANS IN ONE PLACE
- View and change reservations from the app
- Direct message with restaurants to ask questions, provide important information like dietary restrictions, and more 
- Earn bonus points for dining at specific restaurants when you create an OpenTable account

Follow us on:
https://www.instagram.com/opentable
https://www.tiktok.com/@opentable
https://www.youtube.com/c/OpenTable
https://www.facebook.com/OpenTable/

Need help? We love hearing from you! Reach out at https://help.opentable.com/

developer: Greene King Brewing and Retailing Limited
description:
The Greene King Pub & Restaurant App Just Got Even Better

Looking for your nearest pub or restaurant? Our app makes it easier than ever to find one—and now, it’s packed with even more features to enhance your visit.

Introducing Rewards – Register and activate rewards to start earning every time you visit, no matter the occasion. With our brand-new rewards wallet, your perks are always on hand—ready to use at checkout through the app or at the till. Simple, seamless, and rewarding.

Order & Pay – Straight from Your Table. Take a seat, pull out your phone, and skip the queue. Browse our full food and drinks menu, place your order, and we’ll bring it right to your table. It’s quick, easy, and stress-free.

Exciting new and improved features include...

- Activate Rewards – Earn and redeem rewards every time you visit.
- App Exclusive Offers - Access to offers only available through our app.
- Upgraded Pub Finder – Better search, improved info, and more photos.
- Smarter Location Suggestions – See nearby pubs when location is shared.
- Search by Features – Filter pubs by beer gardens, play areas, and more.
- Easier Offer Discovery – Quickly spot current deals and promotions.
- New Menu Design – Faster, easier browsing and item selection.
- Simpler Basket Editing – Add or remove items with ease.
- New Home Screen – Everything you need, front and centre.
- Track Your Savings – Clearly see what you’re saving in the app.
- Improved Order History – View and reorder with a tap.
- Live Wait Times – See how long your order will take.
- Rewards Wallet – Keep your rewards handy and ready to use.
- Fresh New Look – A smoother, faster experience throughout.


Discover our brands: Greene King pubs, Hungry Horse, Flaming Grill, Farmhouse Inns, Farmhouse Kitchen, Chef & Brewer Collection, Wacky Warehouse, Belhaven, Metropolitan Pub Company.

When you want pizza, you really want pizza. Luckily, our app is the quickest and easiest way to order one with a whole host of exclusive features. Want to know more? Course you do…


ORDER PIZZA

Scroll through our easy-order menu and treat yourself to an all-time classic or discover something new! You can even Create Your Own customised creation, give it a name and save it for next time. 


DELIVERY OR TAKEAWAY

Whether you want to collect from your local store or have your pizza delivered to your door, our app’s got you covered. With stores up and down the country, you’re sure to find a Domino’s Pizza near you. 


EXCLUSIVE PIZZA DEALS

If deals are your thing, you’ve come to the right place (almost). Download our app and you’ll find dozens of exclusive pizza deals to suit any budget (and any occasion). You can even add your vouchers to bag discounts on your order!


GROUP ORDERING

If you need to order pizza for the whole fam, you can set up a group order to make ordering for the gang a doddle. Just send them an invite, let them choose what they want and it’ll get added to the order! 


PRE-ORDERING

If you know you want pizza later, but you’re ready to order now…no worries. Get your order in early, let us know when you want it, and we’ll do the rest. Oh, and if you know you want the same as last time, you can just choose it from your order history! 


PAYMENT

Oh, and when it comes to settling up, you can pay pretty much however you like…using card, PayPal or with just a few taps thanks to Apple Pay. Plus, you can keep an eye on your pizza’s progress with our trusty pizza tracker.
 

So, if you haven’t downloaded our app yet, you’re missing out on everything you love about Domino’s and so much more. 

Hit the link to download now and see it with your own eyes!

By downloading and using this app, you confirm that you accept our Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy too.

UK
https://www.dominos.co.uk/legal/content/termsandconditions
https://www.dominos.co.uk/legal/content/privacypolicy
https://www.dominos.co.uk/legal/content/cookiepolicy

Ireland
https://www.dominos.ie/legal/content/termsandconditions
https://www.dominos.ie/legal/content/privacypolicy
https://www.dominos.ie/legal/content/cookiepolicy

Order finger lickin’ good food, get offers, discounts, rewards and more, with the KFC app. Download it today and join the millions of happy customers who can’t get enough of our delicious chicken, freshly prepared and hand-breaded in our restaurants everyday, ordered straight through our takeaway delivery service. It’s an app the Colonel would be proud of.

Win free food with KFC Rewards Arcade
Tired of collecting stamps just for regular fries? You can now win free food instantly with our new rewards programme, KFC Rewards Arcade. Simply log into the KFC app, scan the QR when you purchase in restaurants or place an order on KFC app, you will be able to play a game in KFC app for a chance to win free food right away!
1000s of prizes to be won every day.


Ditch the queues with in-app ordering
Ordering via KFC delivery is quick, easy and hassle-free on the KFC app. Browse the full KFC menu, lock in your order, pay securely wherever you are and choose whether you want to dine-in or takeaway, then simply wait for your driver to pick up your order and get chicken delivered straight to your door. Find your closest KFC restaurant with our improved Restaurant Finder. And forget queuing at the till. You can also order for KFC delivery and collect. 


The whole KFC menu in your pocket
At KFC, there’s something for everyone. Browse our mouth-watering menu at home, in the office or on the move and feed your KFC craving whenever hunger strikes with easy order-and-collect or quick delivery. And if you’re wondering what’s exactly in our food, or you have a food allergy or intolerance, you can quickly view our allergen and nutritional information for each item on our menu with just a couple of taps.

Discover tasty KFC deals and offers
Hungry for a bargain? Save on food and drink with our deals and offers. Log in to your account on the KFC App to find your exclusive discounts waiting for you.


Enjoy our timeless fried chicken classics
Feast on our tasty buckets of Original Recipe chicken, tuck into one of our delicious fillet burgers or twister wraps and turn up the heat with our spicy hot wings. Fancy a little bit extra on the side? Try our signature KFC gravy, Signature Fries, bite-sized Popcorn Chicken, sweet corn cobette, creamy mash, and more.


Try the best vegan chicken burger
If you're vegan, vegetarian or looking to try out vegan food, experience our award-winning Original Recipe Vegan Burger at your local KFC restaurant. It’s got the Colonel's stamp of approval and PETA’s too – crowning it the best vegan chicken burger out there.


KFC Halal
In our KFC Halal restaurants, we do not handle any pork ingredients, and all the food and drink items served in these restaurants are approved by the Halal Food Authority. We were able to ensure that the halal certified chicken would also meet the rigorous animal welfare standards we employ in the UK, and we consulted leading animal welfare groups about this.


Your order, your way
Ordering your favourite KFC has never been so simple than with the KFC app. After you’ve decided what to order, choose how you would like to collect it – dine-in, takeaway, drive-thru or table service, or even better, get it delivered to your door.


Download the KFC app today
If you're looking for quick, simple and secure mobile ordering, plus tasty offers and rewards, the KFC app is where it's at. So, download the app today and get the finger lickin' good chicken you crave.

Order food and drinks with the Wetherspoon app, from your phone, and have them delivered to your table. 
 
	•	Order a meal, a round of drinks or both – and we will bring them to your table.
	•	Paying is simple: use your card, Apple Pay, Payit or PayPal.
	•	Take advantage of the reorder function to purchase rounds, when in a group.
	•	Book a stay at one of our hotels.

Boss it with the Subway® App. 



With our new App you can discover...



All-new Subway Rewards®
Earn amazing benefits, points you can convert to Subway® Cash to spend on Subway® treats, sweet surprises and perks that get better the more you order. Rise through three new member levels to earn points faster and get more rewards.



Order Ahead
Jump the queue by ordering ahead and save your faves. 



Quick Re-Order
Get your last order in a single tap, right from the dashboard



Plus
Discover our menu and find your nearest store. All in one handy App! 



Ready to boss it? Download the new Subway® App today!

The Caffè Nero app is the quickest route to your morning coffee and means you’ll never lose your loyalty card again! Link your debit or credit card for secure and speedy payment, enjoy watching your stamps build on your digital loyalty card, plus earn exclusive rewards along the way.

Scan the QR code in the app and the rest happens automatically… apart from your coffee, which our Baristas will handcraft just the way you like it, as usual.

You can also find your nearest store with our in-app location finder.

Pay securely • Collect stamps • Earn rewards

soul club makes the bench better 

soul club is the tastiest way to enjoy wagamama. earn stamps and unlock food on us. unwrap a birthday gift of gyoza*. get a first taste of new dishes at exclusive events. bring friends on board and both of you will get a bonus reward from us*. and all it takes to unlock all of that? a quick download and a few details from you. time to get stuck into soul club  

a welcome reward 

join the club and we’ll pop a tasty welcome reward* straight into your wallet.  just a little something to get you started  

earn stamps as you eat 

earn a stamp every time you spend £12 at wagamama*. when dining in, just pay via the app. for click + collect, enter your soul club email when you order. and when ordering deliveroo, simply pop your soul club email in at the checkout. easy  

unlock food on us  

for every three stamps you collect, you’ll unlock food on us. for the first three? you’ll unlock a side on us. after six? that’s a main. then start your stamp book again to earn more sides + mains on us* 

a birthday gift from us  

we’ll celebrate your big day by giving you a gift, straight in your wallet* 

get a first dibs on exclusive events 

be the first to try our new dishes before they hit the bench, and get involved in more exclusive soul club experiences only open to members 

refer a friend 

introduce your friends to soul club and when they sign up and visit, you’ll both get a bonus reward*, as a big thank you from us   

*t+cs’ apply  

want to know more on how soul club works? find all the t+cs’ in the app

ResX is an exchange to give and take last minute reservations at the most in demand restaurants.
 
Submit a reservation you can no longer make.
Grab a reservation that you now can.

The city’s best plans, without the planning.

For terms of use and more details on our ResX Premium subscription, please visit: https://bit.ly/ResX_TC

Warning: downloading the Nando’s app makes your phone 10 x hotter. Order food from your local Nando’s - looking at you PERi-PERi chicken - and keep track of any Chillies you’ve earned with your Nando’s Card. Hot stuff. 

Chillies, what are those? 
We’re not talking PERi-PERi. For once. It’s how you earn rewards with your Nando’s Card. Sign up and earn a Chilli for every order over £7 on the Nando’s app. Chillies = Rewards and Rewards = free food. It’s our kind of maths. You’ll get a free Chilli just for signing up, too. 

It’s an exclusive, darling 
Getting the Nando’s app won’t just hot up your phone. You’ll also get a first look at things like menu releases and offers. So you can be that guy. 
 
Spicy delivery 
Sofa feeling a bit *too* comfy? Say less. Order takeaway on the Nando’s app and have it delivered straight to you.  

Grab and go 
In a hurry? Order ahead with the Nando’s app and click and collect.  

Table service 
Beat the queue, scan the QR code on the table and use the Nando’s app to order and pay instead. You’ll get your food fast and feel like an A-lister. 

A thank you from us  
NHS and HSE staff get a 20% discount when you Eat-in or order Collect – just register your discount online.

Get rewarded every time you eat at Zizzi. Join the Zillionaires’ Club - our loyalty app that gives you points, free food, exclusive offers and rewards – in restaurant or on takeaway.

Every time you visit Zizzi or order online, you earn points. The more you visit, the more points you get. Then you swap them for food and drink you actually want.

Free food, exclusive offers and a few surprises along the way. No catch. Just decent rewards for eating your favourite Zizzi food.

How it works:

- Sign up to our loyalty app and get a freebie on your first visit.
- Spend £10+ when you visit to earn Zs (that’s what we call points).
- The more you visit, the more Zs you earn.
- After your fourth visit, you’ll get a free Surprise Perk.
- Use your Zs to get free food and drink in restaurant.
- Order click & collect or delivery and you’ll earn Zs on those too.

Plus:
Zillionaires get special access to exclusive offers, discounts and competitions throughout the year.
You’re already eating pizza. Might as well get rewarded for it.

Exclusive Fast Food Offers & Tasty Rewards

Why pay full price when you can enjoy unbeatable fast food savings? The BK App gives you access to exclusive deals, food rewards, and limited-time offers like our famous WHOPPER® Wednesday. Whether you're grabbing a quick snack, ordering food delivery, or treating yourself to a full meal, the BK UK app ensures you get the best value on all your favourite food. Plus, with fresh fast food vouchers updated regularly, you’ll always eat like a king or queen—without breaking the bank!

Order Your Way with Click and Collect

Skip the queue and order burgers online with click and collect through the BK App. No more waiting in line simply customise your Whopper® or other favourites, place your order, and enjoy burger takeaway that’s hot and ready when you arrive. Plus, as a welcome gift, get a free WHOPPER® on your first order over £3. Order burgers online with ease and enjoy Burger King food without the wait.

From Our Door to Yours – Fast Food Delivery

Can’t make it to BK UK? No problem! The BK App brings your flame-grilled favourites straight to your doorstep. Order burgers online from the UK Burger King Menu and enjoy fast food delivery powered by UberEATS. Use your loyalty points and BK Deals for even more value while enjoying Burger King food from the comfort of your home.

Find Your Nearest Burger King

AI Food Calorie Counter helps you track your daily calorie intake with ease. Snap or upload a photo of your meal, and get an approximate calorie count. Add dishes to your daily log and see how much of your 2000 kcal daily allowance remains.

Features include:

1) Food Journal: Log meals, track calories, view daily progress

2) Photo-Based Calorie Estimation: AI recognizes dishes or ingredients, with optional manual adjustments

3) Portion Guidance: Use your hand as a size reference for more accurate estimates

4) Challenges & Habits: Simple, motivational tasks to encourage mindful eating

5) History & Analytics: Review the last 7 days of your intake

6) Recommended Reading: Curated articles on nutrition from trusted sources

Basic version: access to meal history for today and yesterday, up to 5 dishes (photo recognitions) per day, two challenges (1 glass of water, No eating after 9 PM), and a preview list of recommended articles.

By subscription: unlock full 7-day history, unlimited meal additions, multi-component food recognition, access to all challenges, and full reading access to recommended resources.

Disclaimer: Calorie information and nutrition tips are for general guidance only and are not medical advice. Consult a healthcare professional before making major changes to your diet or lifestyle.

Enjoy exceptional dining with 50% off food. First Table rewards you for booking the first table of the night at incredible restaurants near you. Discover new favourites and save every time you dine.


With First Table, food lovers get 50% off their food bill when they book the first table of the evening, the perfect way to explore new restaurants and enjoy your favourites, all at a fraction of the price.
Discover over 3,000 handpicked restaurants across the UK, Australia, and New Zealand. Whether you're after a midweek meal or a memorable night out, First Table helps you dine smarter.
How it works:
• Browse top-rated restaurants in your area
• Book the first table of the night, lock in with a booking fee
• Enjoy 50% off the food bill for 2, 3, or 4 people


Why diners love First Table:
• Save money while eating out more
• Explore new cuisines and venues
• Support local restaurants
• Easy, seamless booking experience


Try something new tonight, and save while you’re at it.


How does First Table work?
Participating restaurants list their first tables for breakfast, lunch or dinner on First Table – showing seven days of availability on our platform. 

Diners are then rewarded with 50% off the food bill for dining at an off-peak time. 

To secure 50% off the food bill, select your city and search through the available restaurants near you. Then select your date and time and book a First Table (booking fee applies) for two, three or four people. 

What’s in it for the restaurant?
Restaurants choose to join at their own discretion, to help fill empty tables and to create a buzz early into their service. That means that while you’re tucking into a half-price brunch or boujee-on-a-budget dinner, you’re also doing them a favour.

Discover new restaurants!
Browse nearby restaurants to discover a hidden gem in your own backyard or lock in top-rated restaurants you’ve always wanted to try. Craving a particular meal? Restaurants are also searchable by restaurant name or cuisine.

What’s the catch?
There isn’t one - that’s the best part! First Table is a win-win for restaurants and diners alike. Restaurants get early customers through the door and diners get rewarded for dining at times that restaurants need them most.

By dining on First Table, you'll not only have a great excuse to connect with mates, dates and fellow foodies, but you'll also be supporting hospitality venues by dining at the times that they need you the most.

Have friends you’d love to dine with? You can even earn credit by sharing First Table with other foodies! Just grab your promo code from your profile, and you’ll both get your next restaurant booking fee half price.
